page.title: 11Religion in the Butley Area
page.content:
The vicar is the Rev.David Gray and he is also responsilble for Orford, Sudbourne, Chillesford and Iken.
A service is held at 11.00 a.m. every Sunday. The Church of St John the Baptist was built in the early 13th. Century. There is no choir but there is a Sunday School.
The ages of the Church Regular congregation Income
AGE | NUMBERS Monthly 0-5 | Collections $55 6-14 | * Other Income p.a 15-20 | Upkeep $1980 21-40 | Church income 41-65 | ********* $2250 65+ | ***** Donations $306
